name: The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 2
name_original: The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 2
description:
The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 2 is an adventure game developed by KING Art. It was originally released in 2013. The Adventure Company published the game.
You can play The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 2 on PC and PlayStation 3.
